ygData.subject: Re: Targetted?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have noticed this as well!  I was not in a group, and was in fact brewing for about an hour and a half in Freeport.  I had not been playing any songs,
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>

>BTW has anyone noticed a faction hit message whenever something dies
>around you?? I was hunting Gnolls in Highhold pass and was constantly



I have noticed this as well! I was not in a group, and was in fact brewing
for about an hour and a half in Freeport. I had not been playing any songs,
only leaning over the barrell crafting Fierce Brew, hadn't attacked anything
all night, and received the faction change notice several times. People
tend to attack certain guards and even a spawning tavern NPC, but I took
absolutely no part in these nearby battles, just making brew and chatting
with drunks (I offered free beer in an auction, heheh).

Roop
